name: Mining Corp.
description:
Mining Companies compete for the resources in the asteroids floating on top of the Alpha Star. 

Destabilize the opponent placing the discarded boulders on their yards, until the asteroid unbalance to their side, just before you escape!

1vs1 RTS

Credits (Alphabetical Order):

- Santi Andrade aka Santificator
- Arkaitz Pérez aka Kaitzo
- Alvaro Luque aka olavra
- Gregorio Montesinos aka Goro
- Javier Tejada aka Plot
- José Miguel Sierra aka Josemi
- Fito Vergara
